description: Defines the ReaderService class which manages reading state including current book, pages, font size, theme, bookmarking, and navigation methods.

classes.name: ReaderService
classes.description: Manages reading state (font, theme, bookmarks, page, etc.)

methods.name: openBook
methods.description: Loads a book and splits its content into pages for reading.

methods.name: nextPage
methods.description: Navigate to the next page if available.

methods.name: prevPage
methods.description: Navigate to the previous page if available.

methods.name: setFontSize
methods.description: Adjusts the font size used for reading.

methods.name: toggleBookmark
methods.description: Adds or removes a bookmark at the current position.

methods.name: saveProgress
methods.description: Saves current reading progress (stub for future implementation).
